about_the_game: Japanese Manga and Anime meet Live Action Hollywood! 2061. A lethal virus has spread following an explosion at a secret military lab. Those infected turned into blood thirsty mutants. In this chaotic world, a boy named Tadzio sets on a journey in search of his father's killer. He's joined by a beautiful female sword fighter named Mifuyu. Together, they fight to survive the apocalypse and revenge!

About the Video

Japanese Manga and Anime meet Live Action Hollywood! 2061. A lethal virus has spread following an explosion at a secret military lab. Those infected turned into blood thirsty mutants. In this chaotic world, a boy named Tadzio sets on a journey in search of his father's killer. He's joined by a beautiful female sword fighter named Mifuyu. Together, they fight to survive the apocalypse and revenge!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
